sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNDIARYINFO WHERE 1=1 AND DIARY_ID = #diaryId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNDIARYINFO SET DIARY_PROGRSRT=#diaryProcsPte#, DIARY_NM=#diaryNm#, DRCT_MATTER=#drctMatter#, PARTCLR_MATTER=#partclrMatter#, ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE 1=1 AND DIARY_ID = #diaryId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DIARY_ID, A.SCHDUL_ID, (SELECT SCHDUL_NM FROM COMTNSCHDULINFO WHERE SCHDUL_ID = A.SCHDUL_ID) SCHDUL_CN, A.DIARY_PROGRSRT, A.DIARY_NM, A.DRCT_MATTER, A.PARTCLR_MATTER, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNDIARYINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DIARY_ID = #diaryId#

SELECT A.DIARY_ID, A.SCHDUL_ID, (SELECT SCHDUL_CN FROM COMTNSCHDULINFO WHERE SCHDUL_ID = A.SCHDUL_ID) SCHDUL_CN, A.DIARY_PROGRSRT DIARY_PROCS_PTE, A.DIARY_NM, A.DRCT_MATTER, A.PARTCLR_MATTER, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNDIARYINFO A WHERE 1=1
AND DIARY_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
AND DRCT_MATTER LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
AND PARTCLR_MATTER LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNDIARYINFO WHERE 1=1
AND DIARY_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
AND DRCT_MATTER LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
AND PARTCLR_MATTER LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNDIARYINFO ( DIARY_ID, SCHDUL_ID, DIARY_PROGRSRT, DIARY_NM, DRCT_MATTER, PARTCLR_MATTER, ATCH_FILE_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #diaryId#, #schdulId#, #diaryProcsPte#, #diaryNm#, #drctMatter#, #partclrMatter#, #atchFileId#, sysdate(), #frstRegisterId#, sysdate(), #lastUpdusrId# )
